content.description:
Directions: Answers must be in essay form. Outline form is not acceptable. Labeled diagrams may be used to supplement discussion, but in no case will a diagram alone suffice. It is important that you read each question completely before you begin.

Phylogeny is the evolutionary history of a species.
content.question: Describe TWO types of evidence — other than the comparison of proteins — that can be used to determine the phylogeny of organisms. Discuss one strength of each type of evidence you described.

frqParts.text: Describe TWO types of evidence — other than the comparison of proteins — that can be used to determine the phylogeny of organisms. Discuss one strength of each type of evidence you described.
